ResQ Classes¶

class pyres.ResQ(server='localhost:6379', password=None, timeout=None, retry_connection=True)¶

ResQ class which defines the Queue object to enqueue jobs into various queues.

Example usage:

>>> from pyres import *
>>> r = ResQ(server="192.168.1.10:6379", password="some_pwd")
    # Assuming redis is running on default port with no password
